meanings.definition: Pintanos: a type of plant native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The pintanos in the garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I learned about pintanos in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The pintanos whispered secrets to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was as vibrant as a field of pintanos.
meanings.sent5: The scent of pintanos filled the air with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.sent1: She studied the art of pintanos for years.

meanings.sent5: The gallery was filled with stunning pintanos creations.

meanings.definition: Pintanos: a color resembling the shade of the plant pintanos.
meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a lovely pintanos hue.
